dc:title: Still Time To Protest The Draft
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Urgent appeal to protest the peace-time Conscription Bill before Congress. Asks readers to write their Congressmen noting that any delay will make for "clear and calm reasoning."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 365 1940-09-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
